messages.title: Everyone knows Labour isn't going to win this time.
messages.content: There is no realistic chance of us winning.

messages.title: More Conservative MPs will just lead to more years of austerity for this area.
messages.content: The Conservatives have wielded ruthless cuts across our services.

messages.title: Voting for the Liberal Democrat is voting for strong local services
messages.content: We have a proud record of delivery and a promise of more. NHS, schools facing cuts, worst satisfaction levels for [text obscured]

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Addressing cuts to NHS services and improving health provisions.
Opposing cuts to schools and improving the education system.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests strategic voting considerations by indicating that Labour cannot win this time and implying the necessity of voting for the Liberal Democrat to oppose Conservative austerity.

images.caption: Labour and Conservative leaders with captions indicating opposition to their policies or likelihood of winning.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet strategically positions the Liberal Democrat as the viable alternative to the Labour and Conservative parties, both of whose leaders are mentioned negatively.
